EmailTemplate.name: 2020BK-05 RDR 2060 Weather Radar Upgrade Program EXTERNAL.2020BK-05 RDR 2060 Wea
EmailTemplate.subject: 2020 BendixKing Sales Bulletin Updates and Discounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | February 2020
Thank you for being a valued customer. Here are this week's sales bulletins:
Dealer Demonstration Equipment Promotion BendixKing is pleased to offer a promotion for demonstration equipment. This promotion will allow our dealers to showcase some of our new product lines at a limited-time promotional price, with Dealer Bulletin 2020BK-04.
RDR 2060 Weather Radar Upgrade Program BendixKing is pleased to offer the RDR2000 Weather Radar System upgrade to an RDR2060 System which provides 50% more power, additional safety enhancements, and pilot workload reduction features, with Dealer Bulletin 2020BK-05.
CAS 66/67A TCAS II Change 7.1 Upgrade BendixKing is pleased to provide sales information and dealer incentives when upgrading the CAS 66A TCAS I to CAS 67B TCAS II and the CAS 67A TCAS II to the CAS 67B TCAS II systems, with Dealer Bulletin 2020BK-06 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020BK-06 CAS 66 67A TCAS II 7.1 Upgrade.pdf]]>.
The complete list of 2020 sales bulletins is available at aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
